column3:
ガノン……

遥か古代に生まれ幾度滅ぼされようとも復活を繰り返す
憎悪と怨念の権化
column4:
Ganon...Ganon was born out of a dark past. He is a pure
embodiment of the ancient evil that is reborn time
and time again...

column3:
復活を諦めない妄念から暴走した姿……
世に放てば 100年前を超える悲劇となるでしょう
column4:
He has given up on reincarnation and assumed his
pure, enraged form. 

If set free upon our world, the destruction will
be unlike anything ever seen before.

column3:
それは魔を討ち払う光の弓矢
貴方に託します……
column4:
I entrust you with the Bow of Light—a powerful
weapon in the face of evil.

column3:
今貴方がどれだけの力と記憶を取り戻せているか
私には判りません……
column4:
You may not yet be at a point where you have fully
recovered your power or all of your memories...

column3:
でも私は貴方を……

貴方の勇気を信じています！
column4:
But courage need not be remembered, for it is
never forgotten.
